statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.AddressID , AA.AddressType , AA.Description
, M1.Name as AddressTypeName
, BB.PostalCode , BB.Country , BB.City , BB.StateProvince , BB.AddressLine1 , BB.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.TCustomerAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TAddress BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'AddressType' WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.*
, BB.PostalCode , BB.Country , BB.City , BB.StateProvince , BB.AddressLine1 , BB.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.TCustomerAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TAddress BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCustomerAddress ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CustomerID, AddressID, AddressType, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CustomerID#, #AddressID#, #AddressType#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomerAddress SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , AddressID = #AddressID# , AddressType = #AddressType# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
